org.apache.distributedlog.namespace

Class NamespaceDriverManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.distributedlog.namespace.NamespaceDriverManager

  • public class NamespaceDriverManager
extends Object
    The basic service for managing a set of namespace drivers.

    • Method Summary

      Retrieve the namespace driver for scheme.

      Retrieve the namespace driver for uri.

    • Method Detail

      • registerDriver

        public static void registerDriver(String backend,
                                  Class<? extends NamespaceDriver> driver)
        Register the namespace driver.
        Parameters:
        driver - the namespace driver

      • getDriver

        public static NamespaceDriver getDriver(String scheme)
        Retrieve the namespace driver for scheme.
        Parameters:
        scheme - the scheme for the namespace driver
        Returns:
        the namespace driver
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when scheme is null

      • getDriver

        public static NamespaceDriver getDriver(URI uri)
        Retrieve the namespace driver for uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - the distributedlog uri
        Returns:
        the namespace driver for uri
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the distributedlog uri is null or doesn't have scheme or there is no namespace driver registered for the scheme
        IllegalArgumentException - if the distributedlog uri scheme is illegal
